descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Sort, puzzle, and relax by building dioramas of beautiful places from around the world—Rated #1 puzzling game in VR!

Puzzle by yourself or with a friend with online multiplayer and local Mixed Reality co-op! 

# Beautiful Graphics
[media]
All puzzles are created by 3D scanning real locations, bringing hyper-realistic graphics to VR!

# Don’t Sweat it
[media]
Play seated, standing, roomscale, or in lying down mode for the ultimate comfort VR game. 

# So Many Puzzles!
[media]
Puzzling Places includes 16 puzzles + 9 free DLC puzzles!

# Frequent Updates
[media]
New Puzzle Packs are released every month! Available for purchase either as DLC or accessed via Puzzle Pass for a single monthly fee—The choice is yours!

# New Features
[media]
Features and functionality (like Hand Tracking, multiplayer, Passthrough, Simple mode, etc.) have been added for free!

# Play Now!
Download and play Puzzling Places now with a free 15 minute trial!
